June 20, 1903 D Clydach Vale Contest
Clydach Vale Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
clydach-vale-contest
None
The Slave
Clydach Vale, Glamorgan March contest - 1st Ystradgynlais, 2nd Alltwen. 6 bands competed. Result shown taken from Brass Band News July 1903, Brass Band annual 1904 shows this result on page 30, - page 45 shows exactly same result but dates the contest as 30th September 1903.
June 14, 2013, 8:44 p.m. May 10, 2020, 1:34 p.m.
1 Alltwen Walter Exley
2 Ystradgynlais Public Band Henry Williams
3 Loughor Silver Sam Bleddyn Dennis
Unknown Result Brynamman Silver Theo Evans
Unknown Result Llandilo Tom Harris
Unknown Result Gorseinon Daniel Williams
